page.title: 08Buying Habits.
page.content: Shopping Survey Our survey showed that 22 people think that the area in which they live is convenient for local shops.16 people think that the prices are not too high compared with other areas.We found that most people use both supermarkets and local shops.Most people get what they run out of at corner shops.From the supermarkets people buy almost all their week's shopping.The majority use Asda and Sainsbury's and find their prices reasonable. The supermarkets are usually visited once a week and the local shops several times.We found that most people visit the City centre once a week and buy fruit and vegetables,clothes,shoes,electrical goods and furniture.Most people use the local fish shop and take-aways once or twice a week.Very few people shop on Sundays
